testing/

hiihat_run_tests.pro


top source hiihat_run_tests

testing

hiihat_run_tests [, /build]

Runs all of the HiiHAT tests in the HiiHAT pro/testing directory. All testcases are assumed to start with the prefix "test_hiihat." Rebuilds the testcase if keyword argument build=1

Keywords

build in optional type=boolean

Rebuild all unit tests in testing directory before running them.

Examples

To run all of the hiihat tests (and rebuild them before we run them), we do:

hiihat_run_tests, build=1
